attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The country and Government are aware of the dangers linked to tobacco and the tragic scenes of children younger than 11 seen smoking on our streets. Whilst efforts of raising the price and age has failed, we the undersigned ask the Prime Minister to consider a "tobacco sellers license (TSL)" forcing shops that wish to sell tobacco to first pay an annual license fee that would be in ratio with NHS, Mcmillan and cancer research funding.
